content: Request, Use Case Stakeholder Review, Use Case Development and Validation, and Use Case Deployment Approval  Metrics: Metric Value and Metric Value Creation  Questionnaires: AI Assessment and Questionnaire Assessment  Other: Challenges and Model Risk Assessment Figure 3-5 illustrates a matrix of various objects and personas involved in AI governance workflows. Each row and column represent different components and stakeholders discussed in 3.2, “Elements of model risk governance” on page 29, showcasing their interconnected roles in executing standardized processes. This visualization underscores the necessity of collaboration and coordination among diverse stakeholders to ensure the effective implementation of AI governance workflows.
